What is the mean `Sepal.Length` for `Species` Setosa?

```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)

iris %>% 
  filter(Species == "setosa") %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(Sepal.Length))
```


How many data points are in the `iris` data?

```{r}
dim(iris)[1]
```
```{r}
nrow(iris)
```
